wikitext.*:
'''Jill Thwaites''' is a British artist currently living in the United States. She has contributed artwork to [[Amon Hen (journal)|''Amon Hen'']] and [[Mallorn (journal)|''Mallorn'']], and had her work displayed at [[Tolkien 2005]] and [[Oxonmoot]].
